item.title: Learning When to Plan and When to Use Tools: WebGPT vs ReTool
item.description: A comparative study of two RL approaches that teach language models when and how to use tools. WebGPT uses browsing with a preference reward model. ReTool uses interleaved code execution with outcome rewards.
